OOC: Wow! Is this the period of the year when we get all those super 
rpers to join? It's great!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., HanaKirei85@a... wrote:
> OOC:*squeaks* ^_^; Hope this isn't bad timing... My first postie 
here, just 
> lemme know if I screw anything up in here, and I'll be more than 
glad to 
> change it! ^_^ 
> 
> IC: A wolf howled, joined by several others in a chorus. After that, 
it was 
> silence...or as silent as a forest could get. One of the pack 
members, one 
> that had strayed from the others, moved towards the opening of a 
small cave. 
> Caution written in every movement, it sniffed carefully at an item 
which 
> shouldn't have been there...a status pod. 
> 
> A bright light emerged, scanning for a beast form. As the wolf was 
scanned, 
> it yelped and jumped away. Away from that and the strange, 
computer-ish 
> voice. "Error...error.."
> 
> The pod opened as the wolf backed farther from it, ears back and 
growling. A 
> small wolf emerged, eyes blue as crystal. Her fur matched that of 
the wolf 
> before her, many shades of grey blended together into one coat. The 
wolf 
> before her looked curious, moving a bit closer and sniffing 
again...but this 
> other wolf didn't quite smell right. Still, this wolf was better 
than no 
> company at all. Not to mention this territory was his, and if this 
female 
> wished to stay, she would be a part of HIS pack. 
> 
> She turned to him, eyes narrowed. Wings opened...bat wings. She 
snarled, 
> revealing fangs longer than the other wolf have seen before. The 
wolf backed 
> away again, tail low...then turned and ran. 
> 
> The bat-wolf smirked, wings settling against her back. The other 
side was 
> covered in fur as well, making them nearly invisable to the eye. 
Looking back 
> and forth, trying to make sense of where exactly she was...and who 
exactly. 
> Her name she remembered...but...
> 
> "Mistra..." she said softly aloud, confirming with herself. Yes, 
that was her 
> name. She remembered that much. But...
> 
> Predicons...Maximals...which side was she on...?
